headline: Shell: U.K. Upstream Merger Is A Good Sign For Shell And A Bad One For The U.K.
summary: Shell and Equinor combine U.K. upstream assets, forming the largest North Sea producer. Learn why SHEL stock could benefit from this streamlined strategy.
